website_summaries.verdict: A rolling paper shredder that has a heavy duty capacity and moves easily.
pros: Can handle up to 18 sheets at once, which is more pages than most other Bonsaii models
Can shred continuously for 60 minutes before needing a cool down time
cons: This cross cut model is not the smallest cut option that Bonsaii offers

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I put this baby to the test. It does what it says it can do and more. I ran it for an hour straight with no problems. Let it cool down a bit (but did no need it). I was a bit scared when it hit a dime glued to my junk mail. It kept on going . I was going to spend $109.00 on a professional shredding service but went for another $50.00 and bought this machine. No complaints here. I did about 100 plus pounds of documents in total.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Well made shredder so far
customer_reviews.text: Ok........ So this thing seems to do pretty well so far. My husband had paperwork as far back as the mid 90's that needed shredding. I finally decided to buckle down and get it done. The shredder allowed me to get it done all in a few hours on the same day. It was quiet enough that I could watch TV while shredding and I didn't have an issue with it over heating. It has a fan and it would kick on if it started to get hot. Very happy with it and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: pengypoo

customer_reviews.title: The Little Shredder That Could and Did and Will!
customer_reviews.text: I am *impressed* with this little shredder. We had several months backlog after unexpectedly having to cancel our quarterly shred service. I was expecting to spend hours catching up. Boy, was I wrong! This little dude ate envelopes full of credit offers, balance transfers, and every other annoying POS junk mail we get. I got through it all, including one time to empty it, in less than an hour. Never jammed, never overheated. I can't say enough good things about this little guy! Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: When this item arrived I sat down with a big stack of papers that needed shredding and went to work. Shredded for 35 minutes strait feeding in stacks of 8 to 10 sheets non stop and the unit just ate it all up ! Didn't get hot or slow down so I would say it passed it's trail by fire
customer_reviews.author: Roaddog

customer_reviews.title: REALLY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: When it worked (1 whole hour) it was great. After several weeks I tried to use it again and the power light blinked but it wouldn't shred. After a few attempts to get the machine replaced or repaired my issue was dropped like a rock. I now have a very expensive dust collector.
customer_reviews.author: J. McBride

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK WHEN RECEIVED AND BONSAII NOT STANDING BY THEIR PRODUCT.  COMPLETE JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shredder a month ago and it never worked (light blinks red and does not pull paper into shred). I have alerted Bonsaii and they refuse to troubleshoot, repair or replace without receiving a video of the unit. I have sent 3 videos and numerous e-mails but they refuse to do anything about their faulty product. Shame on them but at least you are warned against buying this trash. Complete waste of money. DON'T MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE I DID!!!
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away Unless You Plan to Replace Every Year
customer_reviews.text: I'm guessing the previous posts were by users who've own this shredder for a year or less. Because two months out of warranty, mine stopped working. The very limited "Instruction Manual" did not address a flashing red power light and a halted shredder, nor did it include any contact information. Google and Amazon pointed to a manufacturer in China and a US retailer with a forwarding.com phone mailbox. As it was out of warranty, the Amazon representative said I would probably get nowhere. I've faithfully maintained this equipment with regular lubricating and never overfeed it. It's supposed to have mechanisms built in for eliminating the most common problems with shredders (jam protection, auto-reverse). None of these has ever kicked in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST shredder ever!
customer_reviews.text: I did a LOT of research to replace my 20yr old strip shredder. This is just for home use, but I didn't want to be bying another one for a long time. I wanted it to have a descent duty cycle and be quiet...shhhh! This excels at both. The best is how quiet it is since so many shredders are horribly loud, even $100+ units. Yea, this was about $150 the quiet and durability make it worth it. And how do they get such a long duty cycle allowing you to run it for an hour before a possible cool down?...simply by adding a fan to the shredder motor so it cools as it shreds. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Was somebody just having a bad day??? - UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: ORIGINAL: Old, beat up cardboard box- ✅ Packaged upside down- ✅ Filled halfway w/ peanuts- ✅ 3 legged, busted shredder tossed inside- ✅ Promptly returned- ✅ UPDATED: a company representative immediately reached out to me and promptly & professionally rectified the situation. They went out of their way to correct what clearly was a weird, out-of-the-norm error and I'm more than satisfied. And like so many other reviews, my new shredder tore through a huge pile of old paperwork with ease. Yeah, there are a couple of minor design issues, but I'll definitely buy from them again. I always appreciate a company that stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is garbage! It stopped working only after a year. I called customer service and we went through the warranty process. They told me this was covered and my replacement item was on the way. Two weeks later, I received a call from ACS (middle man between Amazon and the seller) telling me my item was voided and it was no longer covered under warranty. So I spent $200 for a shredder that lasted 1-year. You’ve been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A star in the office.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who usually buys a piece of office equipment or an appliance at my company usually gets snide comments regarding how the unit fails to live up to it's promise. "Who bought this piece of..." Not so with this unit, nothing but positive comments. "Love" has been used a couple of times. Eats everything you throw at it without even straining including CDs and credit cards. Full indicator works and the window in the basket is a great feature. We don't use it for hours on end, but we will chew up a 100+ pages at a time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bucella

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work as advertised, TWICE
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to schred some A4 sheets of paper (thousands of them). We just couldn't put more than 6-7 every time. The first machine got stuck after (to give an aproximate idea) less than 50 pounds of paper. We've tried to fix the problem but couldn't. We returned the item. Amazon gave us the option to get another one and we decide to give it a try. The second item performed even worse. We returned it as well. I don't like giving bad reviews but you asked me so here it is. Now, Amazon is nothing but GREAT! We got a refund and we decided to schred the paper in a different way.
customer_reviews.author: Ottusio

customer_reviews.title: Wow- Used and Dirty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom as a mother’s gift. It arrived and is completed used! So dirty with paper shredded and still in the bin. I cannot even believe it. It was not even packaged property. Looks like someone unplugged it after using, threw it in a box and shipped it out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: When the shredder worked we really liked it. However, it only worked for 3 months and now it is completely dead. When I called to get it replaced through the warranty, I was told it didn't qualify and it was under manufacturer warranty. They then gave wrong information for me to try to contact the manufacturer. I paid for a warranty that was from the date of purchase, yet they wouldn't honor it. Thank you amazon for providing excellent customer service and taking care of this! I'm sending it back and will look at different brands this time.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this !!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item however, about 6-8 sheets into shredding this item just completely stopped working. It no longer even gets power to it i have tried several times. We reached out to the maker and we are still waiting on our reply back. Horrible customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: silent, powerful efficiency
customer_reviews.text: After 2 less powerful shredders died, I finally found excellence in this Bonsai shredder. Granted it cost more than the previous 2 combined, but the cost is appropriate to the quality of this machine. It can run up to 60 minutes without overheating; it can handle up to 18 pages of paper at a time; it is awesomely quiet. The catch basket is generous in size & easy to empty. The wheels are handy, but should be optional for those of us who want to place the unit off the floor. An excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Morgan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing really chews up paper! I bought it primarily to shred junk mail in the envelope instead of having to open and separate it. Now I just drop the entire junk mail envelope in the shredder and presto! My one criticism is that the loading slot is too short and barely fits an 8-1⁄2 sheet of paper which is sometimes annoying. Overall this thing is a beast and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: It's Possessed!
customer_reviews.text: My unit worked well for the better part of the first year, but then, it has been behaving strangely over the past 4 months. All of a sudden, the unit will start running by itself -- without any paper being fed into the shredder. This happens randomly, so I've been keeping the shredder OFF, until I need to shred something. However, when I turn ON the shredder, it runs non-stop -- even before I feed paper into it. I'm disappointed in this product, because my previous shredder lasted for many years. As such, I can not recommend Bonsaii shredders.
customer_reviews.author: The Chairman

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Did not live up to its reputation at all. Jammed right away with only 3 pages and was not cross cut at all. Tried several times and just kept jamming. Rated one star only because I had to in order to leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Stoll

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older paper shredder because of the 60 minute run time, 18 sheets of paper. It does take the 18 sheets of paper, but doesn't run even a half an hour before it just stops. No overload or over heat light comes on. It just stops. After about an hour you can shred for about 10 minutes before it starts doing the same things all over. I am extremely unhappy with this unit, but my return time ran out so I am stuck. I will never buy a bonsaii product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong voltage
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was for 220 volt. I had to return it. The website descriptions did not say anything about 220 volt.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Dead after minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: We barely got to use this shredder before it simply quit working. We last used it a couple of months ago. It seemed to be just fine. Today, we plugged it in only to learn that it is dead. Our last shredder (purchased from Staples) worked for many, many years (20?). It cost much less than this one did. Given the very brief period of use-life of this Bonsai shredder (less than 4 months of only periodic use), it deserves much less than one star. Unfortunately, if we don't give it at least one star, we have no way to warn you away from this product. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Reynold C. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not perfect, product. A good value.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product, I shredded a large stack of papers that had backed up while I was without a shredder. This included some credit cards and odd items. There were no issues, even though I approached the recommended maximum shredding time. Since then I have settled into a routine of doing small shredding jobs every day. I like this product. My only complaints would be speed being a bit on the slow side, and it seems to take forever to stop working after the last item goes in. Seems to be a good value for the money, compared with others I have owned made by Fellowes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within days.
customer_reviews.text: We ran this shredder enough to almost fill the paper bin once, then it completely stopped working. Power light is lit, but it will not shred in Auto or in Reverse. Tried emptying the bin and turning unit off and on several times, but it simply does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: KurtWM

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could shred LOTS of newspaper to amend the clay soil in my yard. I have shredded for hours at a time and this has not overheated once. I’ve also shredded cardboard without issue! I did buy the sharpening and lubricating sheets, which I use after my 4-6 hours of shedding. I figured this would be trash when I finish this project, but I don’t think that will be the case. I’m impressed
customer_reviews.author: Candylicious

customer_reviews.title: This is a powerful Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is worth every penny. I had 4 30 gallon worth of shredding to knock out and i was able to shred until I got tired. The product states that it has a 60 min run time but i know for a fact I ran the machine for close to 2 hours or more. Not one time did it over heat on me. Best bang for your buck here.. If you have a big job I recommend you spend the money you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: marcus

customer_reviews.title: Complete piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for the first time after ordering it 3 weeks ago. It jammed with 6 sheets of paper. The reverse option does not work, so it got completely stuck. I finally managed to pull the half-cut paper out, but now the power button blinks rather than stays solid. It doesn't operate. Amazon deserves 5 stars for agreeing to a refund without having the shredder sent back. The junk is so bulky that it's a waste of shipping cost for Amazon. The shredder deserves -1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A quiet slow overpriced shredder
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Overpriced product. The shredder is slow, that’s probably why it does not overheat. The slot for the paper is small, my back hurts from guiding hundreds of sheets of paper into the machine. Pros: Amazon Prime delivers it in two days. It can handle staples and CDs (not to sure about paper clips). It’s small and rolls under any desk or counter. About 21”(H) and 14”(W). Length of individual shredded particles, 1.5” large enough to read what's on the paper. It arrived with a garbage bag (thanks). Unfortunately it does not compare to my Fellowes 001500C, which is on its last leg. I need a faster, quicker, monster of a shredder. I’ll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: SimoneNYC

customer_reviews.title: A few days after the return period - it....
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, of decent build. OK - A few days after the return period, the AUTOMATIC/OFF/REVERSE (as opposed to manually having to turn it OFF and the master power switch in the back ON/OFF) malfunctions. MALF = the front AUTO switch can only turn off the AUTO ON or REVERSE. The Main Power Switch still works. I unplugged the unit and looked for any sensor blockages, etc. under the main shredding area, nothing. I tried some series of plugging it in, turning ON/OFF, Auto/OFF/Reverse, to perhaps reset it - No. I don't think the service of the company or quality of this product is worth your time, effort, and aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder! The perfect RX for my paranoid neighbor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my paranoid neighbor who thinks everyone wants to read her stuff. She sleeps much better at night now. Shredder is powerful and really digs into pages even when loading near it's advertised max. I chose this unit specifically because of the high rating/reviews and while hesitant to spend what I consider to be a lot of $ for something like this I have gone through many cheaper units myself over the years and was never pleased. This one gets the job done and with it's run-time should satisfy just about any average office or home user.
customer_reviews.author: JeepGuyFL

customer_reviews.title: Bonsaii EverShred C149-C 18-Sheet Heavy Duty Cross-Cut Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave the product 3 stars due to an issue with the plastic casing. The manufacturer reached out to me re: the review & voluntarily offered to make things right as a result. I received the replacement shredder this morning & all looks great. The shredder is tough, runs a maximum of 60 minutes (steady shredding) before it needs to cool down, & also has a large capacity shredding bin of 6 gallons. Great product for home office.
customer_reviews.author: wil41do

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to check it for operation when it gets delivered
customer_reviews.text: Shredder was DOA right out of the box. Plugged it in, pushed the switch, power light did not come on. Did some light tapping on the top, and the power button would flicker, but wouild not stay on. Ardered a replacement. We'll see if the replacement is any better
customer_reviews.author: David Covino

customer_reviews.title: A capable shredder for home and small office use
customer_reviews.text: I have now done several large shredding sessions with the machine, going through about a two inch stack of paper in each session. That about fills the basket. The shredder has worked well and consistently so far. I do not challenge it with more than about 6 sheets at once, because I hear it working harder at that point, and would rather not push it to overheat. It made easy work of paper, staples and credit cards. I have not tried a CD yet. It is not nearly as loud as other shredders I have used. It did shut down after an hour of continuous shredding, as the manual indicated it would.
customer_reviews.author: BarbK

customer_reviews.title: It is not a micro cut.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a micro cut (my bad), the strips are 3/16'' wide and 1 5/16'' long. Way to much money for that. As for customer service, I am a bit hard of hearing, so at times it is difficult to understand people who do not speak English as their first language. The faster they speak the less I understand. However, I sent an email and it was answered within 24 hrs. The unit looks nice, the motor is quite, and the bin is easy to remove and install and the unit move easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: It was great when it worked for the three-times we used. After four-months it no longer works. It appears to be something electrical.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Angelillo

customer_reviews.title: A good shredder
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, quiet and quiet. For that alone it gets 4 stars. I just started using it this afternoon and so far no complaints. It lost one star on price. The cut is large, but it does the job. If I had a lot of sensitive paperwork it would not be acceptable. But for everyday office shredding it is great machine. I did test it and 18 pages of 20 weight paper ran through with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Paper SlaveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second one of these I have bought. I purchased the first one for the office. We have been using it daily for 3 years without any issues, so I bought one for home as well. Noise level is low enough that it doesn't disturb someone on the phone nearby or scare the cats. It goes through credit cards without any problems at all and stacks of paper are not a challenge. Also, I have yet to have it overheat even with some prolonged sessions of record destruction.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Roper

customer_reviews.title: So far I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far this shredder has been able to keep up with heavy use. It does take some cool down time but it is very short (few minutes)and I am able to get through high volume usage fairly well. Also much more quiet than Fellowes shredders I have had. Shredders seem to burn out within a year if not less (at least the last 2 Fellowes I had) so I will update if issues arise as I have only had this shredder a few weeks. But I am impressed so far. The Fellowes shredders I had needed very long cool down...hours. Plus they were very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Norma B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder
customer_reviews.text: July 2019 -- Shreds like a champion, low noise, easy clean up of bag/basket. Excellent customer service. I had trouble with my shredder, used the contact info on the sticker on top of the machine. Bonsaii responded right away, and took care of it. Thank you Mia. I love this company. UPDATE June 2020; Sadly the shredder stopped working. I contacted Bonsaii for help. They responded quickly and helped me determine I needed a replacement. Five days later I got a new unit, no charge. I am impressed wit this type of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: BernieM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: So far we have no issues with this shredder. Our old shredder died on us and we needed something that shredded alot without overheating in a short period of time. This shredder is quiet and actually runs for a long time, it has not overheated yet. It came with little garbage bags for the shredded paper, that's a plus. It is quite bulky and has a little weight to it, also has a built in fan that keeps motor cool as it shreds.
customer_reviews.author: MRS Hulk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine. Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I had tons of docs that needed shredding. This thing is a little beast. I ran this for pretty much 9 hours straight for 2 consecutive days, 47 trash bags worth, and it never turned off due to heat or overload even once. UPDATE - 04/13/2020 Great customer service. I had a slight issue with my shredder after a few more months of very heavy use. I contacted them through Amazon, and they made everything right very quickly. Highly professional and a pleasure to deal with. Highly recommended all the way around. I love this shredder. It makes life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mhan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: I used my new paper shredder for more than a month before writing this review - why praise it if it didn't last? It's lasted. I've used it, so far, to fill up 8 or 9 huge plastic garbage bags with shredded paper and plastic. It's the first shredder I've ever had that hasn't died pretty quickly. If I feed in too much it chokes, reverses and then just works again after I fish out the excess. I'm really impressed with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert Cumberdale

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built, sturdy machine that gobbles up materials as advertised. I've shredded credit cards paper of varying shapes and consistencies, and the machine has had no problems with any of it. It's pretty quiet to run, and the by-product is a small, confetti-like ribbon, about 2" by 1/2". This is my first home shredder, so I don't have a lot to compare it to. But for the light-duty shredding I need to conduct (about 100 pages a week), this product s more than up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: RMP

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer Support Doesn't Exist
customer_reviews.text: Device failed and unable to get ahold of support. Manufacturer date is September 18, 2018. Failure occured April 10, 2019. Didn't even shred two bags full before the power supply went out. Oh, and don't expect support from the manufacturer, they have a sham front to make it appear there is help, but you will never get a response from the support email or phone number.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: After using several lower grade shredders and being frustrated with them overheating or failing after a few years, I decided to make a more significant investment and get sturdier shredded. This one did not disappoint, it is quiet, shreds quickly, and has the added convenience having wheels at the bottom, which makes moving the unit around (for example for cleaning the floor) a breeze. Maybe the only downside is that the size of the shredded paper is not super small; it is cross-cut but not micro.
customer_reviews.author: Aggied

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty shredder
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for shredding empty Amazon cartons and cardboard in general (1 sheet at a time). The unit is relatively quiet. Provided handles allows for easy movement into a different area or room. Good quality casters roll well over carpeted surfaces. Collection bin is a good size so it doesn't have to be frequently emptied. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KailuaKat

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The papers have to be lined up to go in the slot. It is hard to get them lined up in the midst of a busy day then it does not roll easily the rollers get locked then I am struggling with moving the shredder closer while at the same time trying to get the papers lined up exactly. The shredding quality is poor
customer_reviews.author: Cturnn

customer_reviews.title: Hefty paperweight. Too bad I'm trying to shred all my paper. No easy way to repair/replace.
customer_reviews.text: During the time it was working, the Bonsaii was a powerful shredder. I'd give it quite a few stars for that, except the Auto/Off/Reverse switch broke shortly after the warranty period ended. Now the machine will only run in Reverse, making it useless for shredding. There's no way to open up the shredder to attempt to repair it, and there's no easy way to return the shredder because the company's based in China. Even if customer service were useful, there's no way I'm paying to ship a 23-pound shredder overseas. It's a $150+ paperweight now. I'm going to switch brands for something that has more secure shredding (microcut) and that has replacement/repair options in this country.
customer_reviews.author: Rakel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder for the home and small business
customer_reviews.text: We bought this shredder for my mother after dad passed away. She needed a durable machine for all of dads old documents and papers. Our amazon basics would overheat and shut down after 20 minutes of 1 and 2 sheet shredding. This one can shred up to 15 sheets with no problem any more and you can hear that motor working. We decided to keep the load light and this machine just ate up the papers with no stopping. The cooling fan is a real plus on this shredder. When our old shredder dies we are going to get this one. That might be pretty soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to get through a huge amount of papers we wanted shredded —boxes and boxes full—So we ordered this shredder. We are very pleased with the job it has been doing. So far we have produced at least 10 tall kitchen trash bags full of shredded documents and it is still going strong. No problems. Glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gery G. Ruddick

customer_reviews.title: It just stopped working after 8 mths and limited use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July 2019. Last week of March 2020, it just stopped working. I did not use it very often at all; did not move it once it was placed in office; filled the bin once between July 2019 and March 2020. Called customer service, they said send receipt and they will send us a new one. They don't want us to send old one back. Just shows they expected the shredder to die. I'm going to ask for money back. I don't need them to send me their garbage to throw out in 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Fuhrmann

customer_reviews.title: I love this shredder!
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well, but it says something about needing a vegetable type oil for it. Do you have it and can you send some with instructions on it's use? It didn't come with the machine. If not, please tell me how to get it. Other than that, this machine works very well. Now I don't have to worry about account and other sensitive information leaking out into the public via paperwork. Thank you very much for this and for sending it on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shredder is a BRUTE !
customer_reviews.text: Had a cheaper shredder which only did a few sheets at a time and overheated in about 20 minutes, Then it took like half an hour to cool back down. The thing I especially like about this model is that it can shred most UNOPENED old bills and letters WHOLE with both the envelope and contents...saves me having to open them up and subdivide into thinner bunches. Also, front access drawer to hold bag with shreddings is way better than the cheaper model where the entire heavy head had to be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The Bonsaii Evershred C149-C is worth every penny. The machine comes assembled and packed very well. Once unpacked and in your home or office, it is quiet and does the job. I want also to weigh in on the company's customer service. I had the opportunity to reach out to Bonsaii US to have them help me with some troubleshooting. Coco responded promptly, answering all of my questions and ultimately, resolving my dilemma. Very comforting to know that the quality of their customer support matches the quality of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: JHS

customer_reviews.title: Buy Extended Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shredder on June 1, 2019 and it is now August 11, 2020 and it stopped working. I don't use it much but I'm just past the one year warranty and it will no longer turn on. I used it yesterday and it was fine.. now a day later and no power at all. I would have thought for the money it would last longer than a year especially when it is just over a year old and rarely used. Do not recommend this item.. not for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Best Shredder I have every purchased
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed all the other reviews before purchasing and was going for the Fellowes, but decided on this one. It worked well. I shredded about 8 13lb garbage bags in a few hours and it didn't overheat, slow down, jam. It worked well. i have a few more bags to do and I am excited to use it. the drawer slides right out easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Norris

customer_reviews.title: Good shredder for the home or home office.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great shredder. It will shred credit cards and thin sheets of cardboard. Note that when it comes time to empty it that some caution needs to be taken so you don't have a mess. The shredder part itself tends to clog up with paper, but this doesn't seem to effect the cutting power. There is nothing in the manual about what to do about this. I should add that you should use the bag that comes with it as it is reusable and fits the machine. The instructions could be better, however. Price was better than anything available here locally for the same capability.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Bigge

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient; decent price.
customer_reviews.text: A nice quiet, quite powerful shredder at a decent price. Can shred and still watch TV, which is much different than our last (10 year old) shredder. The pages go through this shredder pretty slowly, which is, I guess, the price you pay for its power and quietness. Also like that it uses plastic bag inside enclosed bin to accumulate shreds; less paper dust, and less messy removal, than having to transfer shreds from a bin to a separate bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry M

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in December with a warranty and 3 months later it will not turn on. Contacted customer service several (9) times and they are not responding. Now I sit here with a broken shredder . I do not recommend purchasing a Bonsaii. Horrible customer service!!! UPDATE: After posting a review, Bonsaii customer service contacted me and within a week I had a new replacement shredder. Thank you for stepping up and making things right Bonsaii!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Christie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for regular home use, and it has been fine so far. Have not tried thick paper yet. Pro: I like that it is on wheels so it won't scratch the floor. Reasonably quiet. Munches credit cards without a problem Con: It will get fooled by a small piece of paper and keep running. No big deal. One suggestion: The power-on LED should be green. Red LEDs are normally used for malfunctions or a paper jam.
customer_reviews.author: M Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for 10 Months!
customer_reviews.text: Just like my Headline states....it lasted with light use for 10 months. I've had several over the last couple of decades, and they usually last 3-5 years. Make you own decision. Let me know if you have any good recommendations...I'm in the Market!
customer_reviews.author: xocy

customer_reviews.title: Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it works fairly fast but then there’s that downtime after 30 minutes Which I wasn’t crazy about especially when I’m on a roll. Also, It is very messy afterwords. I wish it came with its own thin liners - it gets the paper caught underneath the bin so you have to make sure it’s flush enough when you close it to continue use. I like the fact that you can do up to 18 pages at a time, and that it’s on wheels to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Linny818

customer_reviews.title: Best Home Shredder For Me
customer_reviews.text: I have been through more home shredders than you know. Finally! Now, I have one that does such a great job, and I do recommend it highly. I've never had a shredder where a plastic bag can be inserted into the catch bin. With my previous shredders, inserting a bag interfered with the sensor, causing the shredder to be disabled, and emptying past shredders was more than a nightmare! Do be aware to not use it beyond the recommended time, and do not overload it!!!...or you'll be buying another shredder! LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Reagan W.

customer_reviews.title: Limited Utility with Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Decent speed, tolerable noise level, good bin capacity. Poor shredding capacity and efficiency. After shredding it will not shut off automatically as it should when set on "Automatic", but requires the user to manually move the selector to "Off". Does not accommodate items wider than letter size paper (8.5"). For example it cannot shred a #10 (business letter) envelope sideways, or a 9x12 standard parcel envelope, or file folder unless folded which significantly reduces its capacity and prolongs shredding time. Would not buy again and would not recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D Ozone

customer_reviews.title: Best Shredder Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have a client who is a hoarder. She is willing to get rid of papers only with a shredder. I borrowed one from my mom that would overheat every ten minutes. I had to order this one and I could not be more pleased. I sit with my client for hours, sorting and shredding documents from as far back as the eighties. Never has it overheated or jammed. I highly recommend this for big jobs. For daily personal shredding you can spend less, but for big jobs or offices this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: very good shredder for the money well worth the extra 40 compared to the other shredders that are about 150 and down this shredder is quiet and works great very pleased with this product will recommend to anyone looking for one
customer_reviews.author: al bastone

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is very heavy. Easy to move with included wheels. Bought it because of the extended run time and sheet size. Only had it a few days, but put an envelope through with 5 typewritten pages. Chewed it up like butter. You must make certain the 6 gallon bucket is properly seated or it won’t work. Like the separate on/off and off/run/reverse buttons for added safety around children. Feels like it will last forever. Most shredders are rated for 6 minute run time with up to 20 minute cool down. This is rated for 60 minutes. We exceeded that 6 minutes on our last one, and it burned up. This has auto shutoff. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. John Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, powerful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the fourth shredder I have had over the last 30 years and it is by far the best. It is quiet, it runs smoothly without any jamming, it can handle more sheets at a pass than any other shredder I have had. I have run it continuously for half hour at a time and it does not overheat. It does a great and thorough job shredding and makes it much easier to get rid of large amounts of paper at one time. I highly recommend this shredder. It is the best!
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: died after a few months...twice
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a while. Then quit completely. Contacted customer service and got a free replacement after a couple weeks of emails back and forth. Replacement worked well for a few more months and quit just like the first one did. awfully expensive for only lasting a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Gobbles paper like food
customer_reviews.text: If I could put tree limbs in the slot I think this machine would shred them. I had a 9" stack of old credit card statements, letters and medical records and this machine chewed them up by the handful. I ran it without stopping and it never paused or coughed. The cooling fan came on so I know I was running it hard. If you have paper by the bucketful, get this one and do not fool around with smaller or cheaper options like I did from the big box stores. They just can't keep up with this beast. BTW it is super quiet and the bin is ample size to do a lot before emptying.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, works great
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can shred thick envelopes with junk mail (AAA, etc.) without opening the envelope. True, I wouldn’t try 18 pages at a time all the time but I shredded 4-12 pretty much for a whole hour and the fan came on only occasionally. Never choked. Produced 4 bags. Sprayed one page with WD40 as it was going through per bag. Very quiet. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mick in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've bought a more expensive shredder for my home use but I must say I'm glad I did. I've never been able to shred as many pages at once and the best thing is how much easier it is to feed it into the shredder since the opening is wider. It's still new so I can't testify to it's longevity, but so far I'm very happy with it. It was worth it to spend more.
customer_reviews.author: PaPe

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it arrived, I started shredding. I had a large trash bag filled with papers and while it took 3 hours, it not once stopped or overheated. WOW!!!! It comes with a bag inside so it's easy to empty and I look forward to shredding more.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Roldan

customer_reviews.title: Very strong shredder and super customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was bery impressed when i first used it. It ate everything i fed it faster than my previous Fellows shredder. After a week of continuous use (with the oiling care it requires) it developed a problem. I then became super i.pressed with their customer service. After sending them some pics they simply sent me a new one.. it has been going strong for a month now with no problems. Overall i am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this workhorse!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it and running it about a year now sits by front door of apartment and is constantly in use to dispose of confidential junkmail works great!! large bin size is awesome, and destroys old credit cards and cd/dvds great too!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!! NOT paid or compensated for my review!
customer_reviews.author: Brennen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bonsaii Danielson!  This shredder is better than the Karate Kid!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something a little more powerful than a desktop shredder. I saw the Bonsaii and was a little nervous. I've always bought Fellowes shredders, they are the staple when it comes to shredding. However after reading reviews, I pulled the trigger and let me tell you....this thing shreds. I'm super happy with this, I just shredded 5 years of documents, took all day and was 5 contractor bags full of shreddings.. This little guy did not even hiccup. I highly recommend and glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible shredder, very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best, ever. Shreds a lot of pages all at ones, very quiet compared to other shredders. Hardly any paper jams and If there are, easy to remove stuck pages and run the shredder again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank and makes short work of paper
customer_reviews.text: I needed to shred through reams of paper, and my puny little shredder wasn't cutting it. This beast can shred stacks of paper at once without a hitch. It is also surprising quiet for its size. One thing to note is that it doesn't cut the paper into the tiniest pieces, although small enough for me. There is a similar model that cuts the paper even smaller, if you need that level of security.
customer_reviews.author: Santokki

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Stays put and really works great. I don't try to go crazy on it by putting the max sheets but I'll for 2 different envelopes in it at each end and they don't overlap, which is great and still add some extra sheets. I'm very careful not to put any envelopes in there with credit card offers without opening them first because they tend to send a dummy card with gooey sticky slime and I'm sure that'll eventually cause problems.
customer_reviews.author: what's a pen name

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item May, 2019 and it is now January and it has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanda Louis

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best on the Market.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this shredder. Our house is three levels and we have a shredder on each level...each a different brand. This brand has proven to be very durable, a real workhorse. I can testify that this shredder does not overheat. Our other shredders have to stop to cool off after a short time. I shredded two bins full and it never had to stop to cool off. I highly recommend this shredder. Having used three other brands, this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blanks

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: We had a paper shredder that was so noisy you couldn’t even talk on the phone and use it at the same time. We researched and found this one and after we received it and used it it is so much quieter. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this shredder. It shreds staples and credit cards and is not overly noisy. My 20 year old son was so intrigued by how well it worked, that he sat and shredded documents for 30 minutes. We are using shredder oil to keep it in good condition. So far, so good! So much better than waiting in line to shred using a mobile shredder. We just pull it out when watching tv and shred a little each day until we get through out large stack.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet shredding
customer_reviews.text: I hate shredders, but for security these days, we all need one to shred the paperwork with our personal information on it. Actually, I should say that I used to hate them. This Bonsaii EverShred C149-C is AMAZINGLY QUIET. Seems most shredders sound like a wood chipper, but this one does not. It was an incredible difference. You can hear it running, but it doesn't make your ears bleed. It does work well also. 18-sheets is doable. It does get warm after 20 minutes of running. So short resting periods would be recommended. I would definitely recommend this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: RLancaster

customer_reviews.title: Works OK but is slow and has issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit in Feb. of 2020 and it works OK. It is much slower and louder than the 10 year old unit, I had that was destroyed when I tried to shred a credit card that I didn't know had a metal insert in it. That shredder would still be going most likely. The worst part is it will not shut off you have to manually turn it off. I've initiated a warranty claim we'll see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: TXAMNZGuy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, robust, and shreds!
customer_reviews.text: This is a home use application where we shred bills, statements and junk mail with personal information. Over the past 8 years I’ve purchase a $50 shredder and the motor failed. Then I purchase an $80 one and the paper switch failed. I finally gave in and purchased the Bonsaii Evershred. This thing is amazing. It is extremely quiet and has no problem shredding several sheets of paper at once. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Ddub

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th shredder I've owned and use it in a home office. I store up piles of paper until I finally get the urge to shred. I have shredded over 1,000 sheets in a sitting with loads in excess of 15 sheets and I've never had a problem. The only time the shredder has stopped was when it was too full. This one is the quietest one I have owned. Also, the blades are deeper in the slot so no chance that I can see of a small child shoving their fingers down into the blades. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BP13

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sturdy document shredder. This fit the bill. It was the second highest rated review on an online review. The first product cost $100 more. I used it yesterday and went through two big boxes of documents. It was the first time I have used a shredder that there were no jams or overheating. It also cuts up staples which save a lot of time from removing them. The only suggestion that I would handle on it like suitcases have for easy movement. Though it has wheels, it was awkward to move around. Shredding is way more doable now.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with our purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of weeks ago, and it has done such a great job. It’s true that it does not overheat, it’s fairly quiet, it can handle Staples, and multiple sheets. I would easily buy another if needed, but it’s pretty sturdy so I feel that we will not need to replace anytime soon. We have already filled a lawn trash bag full of shredding, with no jamming or overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this shredder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for residential use only. As compared to my previous shredder, an Amazon Basic, this one is much better at three times the price. Things I like best: Very quiet Large capacity Removable bin. Much cleaner. Wheels. Ok, i didn’t have to carry it to the office. Will probably never need them again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kadzielawski

customer_reviews.title: Tough shredder -Shreds paper easily, quietly
customer_reviews.text: The shredder is incredibly quieter than the Fellows shredders we’ve owned. It is tough, takes a lot of paper and works continuously. I’ll run it for over an hour and have yet to see any issues with overheating or overloading. I’d say at this point, so far, we like this bonsaii shredder much better than the fellows models due to low noise level, smooth, effortless operation and durability. excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: cmack709

customer_reviews.title: Quality shredder but too slow
customer_reviews.text: This is my second shredder on 2 weeks. I returned Amazon Basics shredder and the customer service was awesome. It seems like all these shredders do not talk about the speed it shreds. They all seem to be so slow and pay more for a better shredder if you are looking for speed. Amazon if feasible please add the speed of the shredders to your description.
customer_reviews.author: Washington

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just took delivery of the shredder chosen to destroy 5000 (yes I said five thousand) gift cards for the company I work for. From the reviews when purchasing there were some that stated the packaging was poor. This was not my experience, it was a shredder that was sealed tight, inside of a box that was well packaged, then inside of a box then inside of another (3 boxes total). I will update further once I put it to the test. UPDATE: This shredder is a BEAST, it shredded all 5000 cards without any issue at all. NEVER overheated, NEVER jammed, and it came with a waste bag for the bin. I would 100% recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken , no box damage so it was put in that way didn’t open right away now can’t return. Shredder struggles to do even 1/2 of what it should do. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the shredder for a couple of days. And I have only used for an extended shredding session once. Shredding for a little over an hour I had no issues with this product. I was amazed at how quiet it ran while shredding. Dumping the shredded material became an issue only if I waited too long and let the basket get too full before emptying. I found it better to empty a little early than to wait too long. So far very happy with t his purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Little John

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper/credit card Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best paper shredder I have ever owned. It shreds up to eight sheets of paper at a time. It has a large shredding capacity and it is on four wheels which allows it to move around easily. I would buy this product again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good...
customer_reviews.text: This shredder seems to be very quiet, rugged and reliable so far. No paper jams and sheets of paper are shredded reasonably quickly. For a machine capable of shredding up to 18 pages at a time, it is relatively compact and maneuverable with four wheels to move it around. Shredded paper is also easy to remove from its slide-out waste basket. I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: russbooker

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially a bit wary of buying s shredder without being able to check it out in a store, but I'm glad I bought this one. So far, it has taken everything I've put into it with out jamming. CDs, credit cards, and big clumps of paper. This machine is truly heavy duty! I would recommend this product to anyone considering it. The box not only included the shredder itself, but also wheels, an instruction manual, and canister liners. The EverShred C149 is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Plastic power switch doesn't fit in mechanism properly ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Plastic power switch doesn't fit in mechanism properly and no power was sent to cutters. Overpriced and poorly made . Buy something else. This is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder for security reasons!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the shredder, so far. I haven't had it long but with the "stay at home" orders, I have managed to shred quite a large amount of paperwork, that I didn't want thrown in the garbage, for security reasons. This cross cut is doing an excellent job. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CharlyD

product_meta.title: Bonsaii 18-Sheet Heavy Duty EverShred C149-C Cross-Cut Paper and Credit Card Shredder 60 Minutes Running Time, 6 Gallon Pullout Basket and 4 Casters, Black
feature_bullets: Continuous running time up to 60 minutes without stopping with an advanced cooling system and patented cutting technology.
Cross-cut shredder up to 18 sheets(Letter Size, 20lb) at a single pass, shreds paper into tiny particles measuring 13/64 x 1-37/64 inches (5 x 40mm); shreds credit cards and staples as well.
62 dB low noise level will give you a quiet and smooth shredding experience and 4 casters for convenience moving to anywhere you want.
6 gallons pull-out wastebasket capacity for less frequent and easy emptying; the transparent window makes it easy to see when it is full.
Auto start and auto-reverse function protect you from the frustration of paper jams; overheating and overloading protection technology keeps sustainable using and prolong shredder's lifetime.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,695 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
